tv.generator-info-name: Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v1.0

programme.title: Intelligent Nurses
programme.desc: Bridget boasts to all the villagers about her brilliant daughter, nurse Lizzy. However, the truth is revealed when Jude discovers Lizzys deceitful ways.

programme.title: A Mothers Love
programme.desc: Caro is in an abusive relationship with Tompolo and refuse to leave the marriage. All hell broke loose when Tompolo attempts to sell their only daughter.

programme.title: Oracle Of Justice
programme.desc: A late kings allegiance to a forbidden brotherhood clashes with the kingdoms traditions. With his soul restless, they face off against the palace to claim the kings heart.

programme.title: Money Must Be Buried
programme.desc: Osinachi is killed because her boyfriend trusted his uncle, now the dead has spoken for revenge and everyone involved must pay.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Chetanna encounters a forest being. Mkpulumma fortifies her girls. A wandering son returns home.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Nwoye returns to a Mgberi where no one knows Nnanna. Obiajulu is handed a heavy task. Urenna falls deeper for Nnanna.

programme.title: Boss Baby
programme.desc: Mary orchestrated a deceitful plot by planting a grown baby in her best friends life and family, aiming to ruin her marriage. However, the scheme is thwarted.

programme.title: Undiluted Ladies
programme.desc: Chief Zack faces trouble when two determined women try to secure a contract from him by any means. However, Chief and Cindy are about to turn the tables in an unexpected twist.

programme.title: Love Happens
programme.desc: Things go sour in life of a couple when a vindictive ex-girlfriend shows up with vengeance, with the help of her brother.

programme.title: Buried Empathy
programme.desc: Prosper and Onyeka Will do anything to make wealth, including sacrificing their father and only sister. Everything would have been fine, but Alakirija the herbalist played them all along.

programme.title: Justice And Innocence
programme.desc: Few years ago, Mercy live a very reckless life and steps on the wrong toes. This action triggers a man and he cursed her. She has to find him and asks for forgiveness.

programme.title: Mad Combo
programme.desc: A struggling driver, disrespected at home, faces his greatest test when his boss makes unexpected advances. Will he resist, or cross the line?

programme.title: Woman Of Justice
programme.desc: Agunze was banished from his fathers land and after he lost every member of his family. The villagers and the elders in council are convinced that he has a hand in their death.

programme.title: A Strong Decision
programme.desc: After several disappointments, Obinna finally finds a rich lady who believes in his dreams and ready to sponsor him, but things takes a different turn and everything changes.

programme.title: Weeping On The Throne
programme.desc: A queen kills Jidennas mother, tries to kill Jidenna to make sure that her son becomes the next king. After some years, Jidenna finds his way back to the palace.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: A love story that transcends boundaries. A young teenage couple, who found a once in a lifetime kind of love, have to fight against all odds to stay together.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: A love story that transcends boundaries. A young teenage couple, who found a once in a lifetime kind of love, have to fight against all odds to stay together.

programme.title: Wedding Tears
programme.desc: Dagogo wants his son Morgan to marry a psycho because of his political ambition, but the story is about to change as he meets an illiterate and falls in love with her.

programme.title: Sins Of Royalty
programme.desc: King Kenneth has a secret his wife does not know, hence her predicament of not having a child for 7 years. Now, he must confess about the sins he committed years ago.

programme.title: Just Us
programme.desc: Larry never wanted to have a child after getting married, but Amelia gets pregnant, and this changed everything.

programme.title: Brothers At War
programme.desc: Theres a never-ending frustration in Johns family, because his uncle will do everything to sell his fathers only piece of land.

programme.title: Reprisal Attack
programme.desc: Evelyn deceives Nnanna into getting married to her, tricked with traveling to Canada put all his hopes on her. Now that she is married and pregnant, the truth comes to light.

programme.title: Bitter Ex
programme.desc: Fred and his fiancee will be spending the weekend at their friends place Jake. This will go sour if Jakes wife does not tell him everything about her ex-boyfriend Fred.

programme.title: A Fighting Choice
programme.desc: A young woman fighting a rare condition finds her one chance at love stolen by her sister, forcing her into a devastating decision that no one sees coming.

programme.title: Return Match
programme.desc: Nkisi and her brother frustrates the entire compound, but everything is about to change as Panguru steps into the compound with his son to distort their plans.

programme.title: Ungrateful Brother
programme.desc: Ikeoku kills his brother because of his wealth, but everything turns bad when everything he did bounce back and ruins his own family.

programme.title: Indomie Heroes Awards
programme.desc: Dufil Prima Foods, makers of Indomie Noodles, launched the Indomie Heroes Awards in 2008 to celebrate, and reward Nigerian children (0-15) for acts of bravery and heroism.

programme.title: Dear Molly
programme.desc: An ex-convict survival is torn between her sister and brother in- law.

programme.title: Jemeji
programme.desc: Senami and Mausi strike a bargain. Obis plans fail. Folake makes a decision.

programme.title: Ring Of Lies
programme.desc: Cebisa brings the pictures of Khutjo to the gym. Is anyone there guilty? Thando and Zuki have an interesting conversation.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: Akins and T-Money compete for the attention of a pretty lady at the lounge.

programme.title: Hustle
programme.desc: The tale of Dayo, a gullible but optimistic young man who moves to Lagos with dreams of making it big.

programme.title: Isibaya
programme.desc: Thandeka and Sbu steal some time alone. Shadrack is determined to have Mpiyakhe discover the truth that lies in his household. Mandla plans to sabotage Sbus happiness.

programme.title: The Johnsons
programme.desc: A family sitcom that focus on an average family based in Lagos Nigeria, their diverse traits and how they cope with what life has to offer them

programme.title: Ajoche
programme.desc: Revenge, war, duty, honor, love and lust are the order of the day, as the people of Ocholuje must learn to survive when they uncover some bitter truths.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: Baba confronts the flatmates for failing to renew their rent.

programme.title: Tinsel
programme.desc: Shoshanna worries about jinxing her big break. Brenda struggles with letting go of control.

programme.title: Greed And Desire
programme.desc: Maru plays it down when Thakane finds inconsistencies in the cost reports. Atleha stages his robbery.

programme.title: Unbroken
programme.desc: Ohimai and Diana fight. Naf shares some information with Tivdoo. Terfa comes to a startling realization.

programme.title: Brethren
programme.desc: Chief Dr. refuses to let Dag win, but his battle is tougher than he expects. Kinto reaches out to Dag in a surprising move. Kemi gives Kofo a lifeline at BHB.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: A situational comedy documenting the lives of four friends who share an apartment. All sorts of chaotic and hilarious things happen as they go about their daily escapades

programme.title: Stabbed
programme.desc: Fatima and her child are accused for killing the man who helped and gives them a life , now somebody has to take the fall for a death, will the mother and daughter be saved from the law?

programme.title: Date My Family Nigeria
programme.desc: A dating show that takes singles looking for love on multiple dates with family members of a possible love interest in the hopes of finding a good match for themselves.

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After moving to a new apartment, two young couple share an unpleasant experience from the hands of their psychotic new neighbor, who would stop at nothing to sever their bond.

programme.title: Tasty Cube Food Arena
programme.desc: A delightful culinary show where celebrities showcase their cooking skills and create delicious meals using natures best ingredients and Tasty Cubes unique flavors.

programme.title: The Real Housewives Of Lagos
programme.desc: Tensions from Carolynas Boho bash explode as Chioma and Laura face off. The Ladies jet off to cool down-and a new, sassy, filthy rich Lady joins in!

programme.title: Recipe For Success
programme.desc: Bisola Aiyeola hosts mothers and daughters in genuine conversations on money, dreams, and life lessons, all while bonding over the preparation of their favourite meals.

programme.title: Comedy Nites
programme.desc: Laugh after laugh, you want to take a bathroom break before we get started- Its that good. Its a half hour of side-splitting Stand-up comedy from a range of comedians.

programme.title: Her Desire
programme.desc: A couples home is put to test when the husband cousins pay a visit, and the unsatisfied wife starts to have an affair with him.

programme.title: De9jaspirit Talent Hunt
programme.desc: A thrilling reality show where entertainers of all ages, including singers, dancers, comedians, magicians, and more, display their talents before a panel of celebrity judges.

programme.title: Date My Family Nigeria
programme.desc: The ultimate romantic adventure where a bachelor or bachelorette embark on a quest to find the one, visiting the homes of three families of the opposite gender to make a choice.

programme.title: Style Magnate
programme.desc: As the final five reflect on their journey, the reality of the competition hits hard. Their next task is to create a three-look collection for a star client. Every piece needs to scream high fashion.

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: The sudden change of character from Ini, an only child of Bassey and Harriet, a working class couple, gives them a concern for her questionable display.

programme.title: Maiden Of Honour
programme.desc: Ifeayinchukwu, a mechanic finds out that his late mother is impregnated by king Ezenna, but his son will not allow Ifeayi sit on the throne.

programme.title: The Billionaire Cook
programme.desc: Alicias rich father never wanted her, he only accepted her when Rays father promised to marry her to his only son. Little did everyone know that she is wolf in sheeps clothes.

programme.title: Life Of Bim
programme.desc: An unfulfilled 32-year-old man trapped in the event of his past must overcome his self-guilt in order to prevent his brother from making the same mistake.

programme.title: Pretty Thief
programme.desc: Vanessa, a charming con artist, targets Adeola in a jewelry shop, but the scheme backfires, forcing her to face unexpected consequences for her actions.

programme.title: Folashade
programme.desc: Under her friends influence, Folashades determination to secure her relationship grows, but her reckless actions raise suspicions of a hidden agenda she is protecting.

programme.title: Chatter That Counts
programme.desc: A lively talk show with five vibrant Gen Z hosts, offering insights on life and business through fun games, music, and talks, while highlighting inspiring SME success stories.

programme.title: Slum King
programme.desc: A regrettable tragedy leads Edafe out of Oro Lede, and Imole must do whatever it takes to prevent Tequila from marrying Selense.

programme.title: The Real Housewives Of Lagos
programme.desc: Tiannah brings a peace offering to Mariam, Iyabo and Laura clash again, Faiths stuck in the middle, and Chiomas Yard Sale may stir more drama. Will Tiannah come?

programme.title: Kiekie Unscripted Experience
programme.desc: Kiekie hosts a lively talent show highlighting strength, academics, and creativity with challenges like singing, acting, balloon buster, and back-to-school tasks each episode.

programme.title: 2nd February
programme.desc: Beulah, in a race against time to save her brothers life, finds herself compelled to yield to Rexs advances, a choice that would haunt her in the days to come.

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: After heartbreaks, two marketers vow never to love again, but when their paths cross, they must choose between keeping promises and giving in to the universes growing love.

programme.title: Bride Quest
programme.desc: Grace is tricked by Solomon into getting married to him, after he deceives her from breaking up with her lover. Now everything is exposed, but she decides to become a Rev. sister.
